Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your daily experiences. Given its unique features and quality, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your life. For this extraordinary opportunity, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $150. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring how this product can benefit you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
